description: Valid single offer with correct OfferRefID and OfferItemRefIDs returns total price
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with SelectedOfferList containing one SelectedOffer
Set OfferRefID to 'a2716059-ee3b-487c-8a63-d72a8c7810a7|am9f9wivlT9SV0Wd7zNRI7001'
Set OwnerCode to 'VS'
Include three SelectedOfferItem elements with correct OfferItemRefIDs and PaxRefIDs
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 200 OK with PricedOffer containing total price for the selected offer

description: Valid multiple offers in SelectedOfferList return total price for each
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with SelectedOfferList containing two distinct SelectedOffer elements
Ensure each offer has unique OfferRefID and matching OfferItemRefIDs
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 200 OK with PricedOffer containing total prices for both offers

description: Missing OfferRefID in SelectedOffer returns error
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with SelectedOfferList
Omit OfferRefID element from SelectedOffer
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 400 Bad Request with error message indicating missing OfferRefID

test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with SelectedOfferList
Set OfferRefID to 'invalid-format'
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 400 Bad Request with error message indicating invalid OfferRefID format

test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with SelectedOfferList
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 404 Not Found with error message indicating offer not found

description: Missing OwnerCode in SelectedOffer returns error
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with SelectedOfferList
Omit OwnerCode element from SelectedOffer
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 400 Bad Request with error message indicating missing OwnerCode

test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with SelectedOfferList
Include SelectedOffer with no SelectedOfferItem elements
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 400 Bad Request with error message indicating no offer items selected

test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with SelectedOfferList
Set OfferRefID to 'a2716059-ee3b-487c-8a63-d72a8c7810a7|am9f9wivlT9SV0Wd7zNRI7001'
Set OfferItemRefID to 'different-offer-id|item-1'
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 400 Bad Request with error message indicating OfferItemRefID mismatch

description: Valid offer with special characters in PaxRefID returns total price
test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with SelectedOfferList
Set PaxRefID to 'ADULT_1_SPECIAL'
Ensure all other fields are valid
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 200 OK with PricedOffer containing total price

test_steps: Prepare OfferPriceRQ payload with empty SelectedOfferList
Send POST request to OfferPriceRQ endpoint
expected_result: HTTP 400 Bad Request with error message indicating empty offer list
